name: LegionellosisTestsForLegionellaSpeciesByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Legionellosis (Tests for Legionella species by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Legionella species organisms),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Legionella culture and isolate),(Exclusion Criteria: 87957-7  Legionella sp identified in Water by Organism specific culture)
